overview:
Martin is the co-founder of Productsy an innovative product company focused on rapid iteration of mobile products.

Martin has over 12+ yearsâ€™ experience in the technology industry with a comprehensive leadership background with specialist experience in leading product and design teams, developing successful new products and services for web, mobile and tablet devices. His prior roles include GM & VP of Product at Geodelic a top tier funded mobile startup. Director of Product Management at CityGrid Media (an IAC company) and for 8 years Martin lead Product teams at Yahoo! Inc.
